name: Greedy Ghosts
description:
Greedy Ghosts is a arena collectathon where you compete against up to four players to store as much candy in your bank as possible!

Complete with Candy Stacking Physics and Power-ups to give you that competitive edge!

This is a game jam title completed in only 48 hrs!

Unfortunately we have obligations that prevented us from taking the game to the full 72 hrs, but we're pretty happy with the result!

Note: gamepads required for multiplayer
